books.author: Indra Das
books.title: The Devourers
books.abstract: Utterly gripping and wholly original, it reinvents the literary fantasy novel for India, imbuing it with depth, emotion and richness.

books.author: Bradley Beaulieu
books.title: Twelve Kings in Sharakai
books.abstract: In the cramped west end of Sharakhai, the Amber Jewel of the Desert, Çeda fights in the pits to scrape a living. She, like so many in the city, pray for the downfall of the cruel, immortal Kings of Sharakhai

books.author: Stella Gemmell
books.title: The Immortal Throne
books.abstract: With this new novel, Stella Gemmell brings the astonishing story of the City to a spectacular climax and confirms her place as a master of the genre.

books.author: Daniel O'Malley
books.title: Stiletto
books.abstract: In this spirited sequel, The Rook returns to clinch an alliance between deadly rivals and avert epic—and slimy—supernatural war.
